name: The Rake

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Most beautiful room I have ever stayed in
reviews.title: Most beautiful room I have ever stayed in

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at The Rake for three nights over the Christmas period, arriving in the evening on Christmas Eve. We could not have received a warmer welcome - even though the staff had an incredibly busy tapas restaurant to deal with!
reviews.title: A warm welcome

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room was lovely, beautifully done. A big thank you to The Rake for a very very comfortable Christmas.
reviews.title: Fantastic short stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at The Rake for four nights and thoroughly enjoyed ourselves. The rooms are first class , designed and maintained to a high standard. The history of the place adds to the atmosphere. The staff could not do more for us and the food was delicious.The choice for breakfast was enormous and freshly cooked. We will be returning and recommending The Rake to all our friends.
reviews.title: Perfect combination of a beautiful hotel and first class restaurant!

reviews.text: we have just arrived home from celebrating our son's 10th birthday - he asked us to arrange a meal in a tapas restaurant - because it's his favourite!! Let me just say it was fab and he was not disappointed!! It was our first time at the restaurant, and we had heard excellent reviews about it.
reviews.title: You won't find better rooms or food anywhere!

description: 4* rating accommodation with silver star breakfast award. Our rooms have been lovingly restored to a standard never seen at the Rake over its 400 years. They are finished mixing the existing character of the Rake with cutting edge modern styling. All are en-suite with either shower or bath. Each room has flatscreen TV with freeview. Internet access available. Popular tapas restaurant on site. Lovely garden/patio area for residents. Set in semi-rural setting with easy motorway access.
